About Us

Explore our history, vision, and mission that form the foundation of our operations.

PT Safari Karya Maju at a Glance

PT SAFARI KARYA MAJU is a company that was officially established in early 2000 under the name CV SAFARI KARYA MAJU, located in Pandaan, East Java.

PT SAFARI KARYA MAJU is a company engaged in the field of sheet cutting and fabrication.

PT SAFARI KARYA MAJU has proficient and competent experience in its field, supported by modern and reliable production machinery operated by a professional and experienced workforce, thus enabling us to provide the best service to ensure our clients' satisfaction.

PT SAFARI KARYA MAJU conducts its business professionally, supported by reliable managerial capabilities. As times evolve, and in line with the company's vision and mission, we will continuously undertake innovation and change to become a more dependable company, capable of competing both nationally and internationally.

VISION

To become a leading and superior sheet metal processing company in providing high-quality and innovative products, and to be competitive in the global market.

MISSION

To be a company that provides the best service for consumers, stakeholders, employees, and the community. To produce high-quality and innovative sheet metal products that meet market needs.

Address: Dsn. Bakalan RT 001 RW 002, Durensewu, Kec. Pandaan, Pasuruan, Jawa Timur 67156

Email: skm.manufacture@safarikaryamaju.com
